A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was good\, in terms of a random space/sci-fi movie.\nHowever\, in terms of the Star Wars franchise\, this movie was impressively terrible. So many subplots that were useless or make no sense. Characters acting out of character\, from an established canonical point of view.  And perhaps the worse of all\, a completely wasted chance to have Luke and Leia work together in what is now the last movie that will have both of them in it. In short\, watch this movie if you want to see some cool CGI\, not if you want to see more of the Star Wars saga.
